name: overmedicated
text: A comment left by overmedicated was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by _cheesekayke, RedGuy, cpnglxynchos)

name: mortshire
text: it slices, it dices, it makes julienne fries.

name: catachresis
text:
What, so a cuisinart is Jamie Oliver?

Oh wait Jamie Oliver cannot make julienne fries

name: brokeaccount
text: Julienne fries are not "rustic".

name: babachewy
text:
A Cuisinart is a little ninja that has agreed to stay in a kitchen appliance.

He knows when you have bought fresh produce as soon as you have entered the door.

He is waiting.

name: chuchurocket
text: too bad he can't let you know when you need to buy eggs and milk.

name: em2
text: This is poetry.

name: dusty
text: The moon has made a note of his face.

name: ih8jonmayr
text: It sure as hell doesn't have no damn dough hoook.

name: saint
text: naked guys doing jumping jacks turns Rod huggins on in ways clothed guys doing pushups can't.

name: spinynorman
text: Note that Ray thinks of things from that fat guy with a handful of wedding tackle's point of view. Not so odd, as Ray is himself a pretty fat person.

name: billyamericana
text: Somehow I'm not totally convinced it was a misunderstanding.

name: retardo
text: A comment left by retardo was marked as spam and excluded. retardo: What a douche. (reported by mistlethrush, Patware, mrn)

name: sargasm
text: So, is it a thing about porn stars that they buy planes?

name: cuddlefish
text: and that they drive late model mustangs.

name: ssddr
text: MAXIMUM CUDDLES

name: cdl146
text: Man, if this movie idea were going downhill any faster it would be in free-fall. "It's just every fat dude's worst nightmare come to life!"

name: ford
text: I am a fat dude, and if you combine this scenario with some good old fashioned zombies, you have my worst nightmare spot on.

name: atmus
text: Especially the new 'fast' type zombies.  Because fat guys can't run very fast or far.  Especially with their pants around their ankles.

name: soticoto
text: The only thing worse than being caught masturbating by your mother bursting through the wall... is being caught masturbating by your zombie mother bursting through the wall.

name: honesttom
text: This strip is just perfection. Nothing about it is bad in any way.

name: bourbonsamurai
text: That last panel is gold.

name: fidget
text: Man it took me several reads to realize that Ray is supposed to be dressed up as Simon "Le Cowell"

name: spicyponyhead
text: I actually thought he looked a bunch like Mike Myers.

name: twohundredninety
text: Apparently it is a Thing of porn actors to respond, when asked about their well-being, by mentioning any boats or planes they've recently acquired.

name: shemmjacc
text: Anyone voting any strip in this arc lower than a five is a homophobe

name: firesign
text:
Taste is taste, and I will leave calling people "homophobe" up to you, as I have no intention of doing so (though I can only assume your post was intended humorously), but I will note that through my whole crawl of the archives so far, this is probably the lowest overall rated strip so far (3.9 at this point) that I thought was a "5".

For me, it's the fact that Ray, upon suddenly realizing (falsely) that his good friend Teodor is a gay porn actor, can only think of how convenient that is for the project of the moment (as opposed to thinking, say, "Wow, I just learned that one of my best friends is a gay porn star. That was rather unexpected and should be commented on").

name: unsentletter
text: handy!

name: mustconcentrate
text: I can't believe this strip isn't rated higher for T's porn industry cameraman outfit and Ray's 'Le Cowell' outfit alone.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: it was basically his regular on-camera industry outfit, too.
